text:
I wonder if I should change my hairstyleï½ž...!
Hana-chan, do you ever think about cutting yours?

Hmmm... I do think of cutting it a little bit
as a change of pace sometimes.

You could also try
styling it differently.

Isn't it fine
like it is?

If you're asking me,
I don't mind at all if you change your hair.

Does that mean
that you like short hair, Producer?

Ah, your right...! In that case, 
long hair gives you more options, right?

Fufu, then I guess I'll let it
grow out a little longer.

Since there's work to consider,
please be cautions about changing your hair too much.
